Package Project

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
Project.MenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<MenuItem>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SetPackage
public class MenuItem extends Object implements Serializable, Comparable<MenuItem>
Represents an individual item in the menu
Implements the Serializable interface to allow menu items to be saved
Implements the Comparable interface to allow menu items to be sorted by item type
Author:
Abdul Qaiyum Lee
See Also:
Serialized Form
